installCommand: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && rm -rf node_modules/fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin && mkdir -p node_modules/fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('node_modules/fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin/index.js','module.exports=class ForkTsCheckerWebpackPlugin{constructor(){}apply(){}};')" && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('node_modules/fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin/package.json','{\"name\":\"fork-ts-checker-webpack-plugin\",\"version\":\"6.5.3\",\"main\":\"index.js\"}')"
